parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the zoom level ('''F'''ield '''O'''f '''V'''iew) start and end values for automatical zooming. <comment><!-- "automatical"? LoL ;-) --></comment>
<br>
The default zoom level is ''<tt>0.7</tt>'' where ''<tt>0</tt>'' is the nearest and ''<tt>1</tt>'' is the most far zoom value.
 <br><br><template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command is '''non-functional'''!</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetFovRange''' fovRange

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fovRange: [[Array]] - zoom level, range 0 to 1 (see description above)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[camSetFovRange]] [0.1, 0.7];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camSetFov]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CAMSETFOVRANGE]]
